nodes.label: let forge = & mut ctx . accounts . ember_forge ;
msg ! ("Ember Forge {} established with {} materials." , forge . forge_id , forge . materials_stock) ;
let artifact = & mut ctx . accounts . artifact ;
artifact . parent_forge = ctx . accounts . ember_forge . key () ;
msg ! ("New artifact {} of type {:?} created." , artifact . artifact_id , artifact . artifact_type) ;
let forge = & mut ctx . accounts . ember_forge ;
let weapon_artifact = & mut ctx . accounts . weapon_artifact ;
let shield_artifact = & mut ctx . accounts . shield_artifact ;

match weapon_artifact . artifact_type { ArtifactType :: Sword => { forge . materials_stock = forge . materials_stock . saturating_sub (10) ; weapon_artifact . power_level = weapon_artifact . power_level . saturating_add (20) ; weapon_artifact . is_charged = weapon_artifact . power_level > 100 ; } , ArtifactType :: Shield => { forge . materials_stock = forge . materials_stock . saturating_sub (5) ; weapon_artifact . power_level = weapon_artifact . power_level . saturating_add (15) ; weapon_artifact . is_charged = weapon_artifact . power_level > 80 ; } , ArtifactType :: Wand => { forge . materials_stock = forge . materials_stock . saturating_sub (15) ; weapon_artifact . power_level = weapon_artifact . power_level . saturating_add (30) ; weapon_artifact . is_charged = weapon_artifact . power_level > 150 ; } , }

match shield_artifact . artifact_type { ArtifactType :: Sword => { forge . materials_stock = forge . materials_stock . saturating_sub (10) ; shield_artifact . power_level = shield_artifact . power_level . saturating_add (20) ; shield_artifact . is_charged = shield_artifact . power_level > 100 ; } , ArtifactType :: Shield => { forge . materials_stock = forge . materials_stock . saturating_sub (5) ; shield_artifact . power_level = shield_artifact . power_level . saturating_add (15) ; shield_artifact . is_charged = shield_artifact . power_level > 80 ; } , ArtifactType :: Wand => { forge . materials_stock = forge . materials_stock . saturating_sub (15) ; shield_artifact . power_level = shield_artifact . power_level . saturating_add (30) ; shield_artifact . is_charged = shield_artifact . power_level > 150 ; } , }
msg ! ("{} cycles of crafting completed. Weapon power level: {}, Shield power level: {}." , crafting_cycles , weapon_artifact . power_level , shield_artifact . power_level) ;
